title: Vegetarisches Gourmet Restaurant
description: Two vegetarian restaurants plus a shopping mall with supermarket, vegan shoes, a take-away tent outside with vegan "junk food" (vegan curry sausage and hamburger), and more. There is a vegetarian magazine and animal rights magazine, printed in-house, and tons of other animal rights and vegetarian cooking info brochures. Offers free cooking courses every Wednesday and Friday evening. Has a farm sanctuary 20 minutes away that is open for touring.
